name: Court Cleric
originalText:
Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
Court Cleric gets +1/+1 as long as you control an Ajani planeswalker.

rulings.text: Because damage remains marked on a creature until it’s removed as the turn ends, nonlethal damage dealt to Court Cleric may become lethal if you cease to control an Ajani planeswalker during that turn.
